## ProgressPromise.then() method

Attaches callbacks for the resolution and/or rejection of the Promise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
then<TResult1 = T, TResult2 = never>(onfulfilled?: ((value: T) => TResult1 | PromiseLike<TResult1>) | undefined | null, onrejected?: ((reason: any) => TResult2 | PromiseLike<TResult2>) | undefined | null): Promise<TResult1 | TResult2>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  onfulfilled | ((value: T) =&gt; TResult1 \| PromiseLike&lt;TResult1&gt;) \| undefined \| null | The callback to execute when the Promise is resolved. |
|  onrejected | ((reason: any) =&gt; TResult2 \| PromiseLike&lt;TResult2&gt;) \| undefined \| null | The callback to execute when the Promise is rejected. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TResult1 \| TResult2&gt;

- A Promise for the completion of which ever callback is executed.
